statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_data;
SELECT policy_holder_name, insurance_type FROM insurance_data WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_data WHERE insurance_type = 'Life';
SELECT end_date, policy_holder_name FROM insurance_data ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, premium_amount FROM insurance_data WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM insurance_data WHERE insurance_type = 'Life' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_data WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, insurance_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_data WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, insurance_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_data WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_data WHERE insurance_type LIKE '%Health%'
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Policies;
SELECT policy_holder, premium_amount FROM Insurance_Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Home Insurance';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_amount FROM Insurance_Policies ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, premium_amount FROM Insurance_Policies WHERE premium_amount > 500 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Insurance_Policies WHERE policy_end_date < CURRENT_DATE();
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Policies WHERE policy_holder = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, premium_amount FROM Insurance_Policies WHERE coverage_amount > 100000;
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Policies WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT policy_holder, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM Insurance_Policies JOIN Insurance_Claims ON Insurance_Policies.policy_id = Insurance_Claims.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder;
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, policy_end_date, premium_amount FROM Insurance_Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Car Insurance';
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy WHERE policy_type = 'Health'
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customer ORDER BY customer_age DESC
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date FROM insurance_policy WHERE policy_end_date >= '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, customer_occupation FROM customer WHERE customer_gender = 'Male'
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender, customer_occupation FROM customer WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM insurance_policy WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_occupation FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_type FROM insurance_policy WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM claim ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agent WHERE agent_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM insurance_policy WHERE coverage_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT policy_holder, premium_amount FROM insurance_policy ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claim WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer WHERE LENGTH(customer_phone) > 10;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_phone FROM agent WHERE agent_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM policy_data;
SELECT customer_name, policy_type FROM policy_data WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM policy_data WHERE policy_type LIKE 'Health%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT agent_name, phone_number FROM agent_data WHERE commission_rate >= 0.1 ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_data WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT customer_name, policy_type, premium_amount FROM policy_data WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM claim_data WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT agent_name, commission_rate FROM agent_data ORDER BY commission_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM policy_data WHERE policy_type = 'Health Insurance');
